languages.text: {n}Некоторое время Джай тоже молчит, погруженная в какую-то внутреннюю борьбу, а затем со вздохом произносит:{/n} "Думаю, тебе лучше это знать".
{n}For a while, Jae likewise remains silent, embroiled in some internal struggle, then finally says with a sigh,{/n} "I think it's better that you know."
languages.original_text: {n}Некоторое время Джай тоже молчит, погруженная в какую-то внутреннюю борьбу, а затем со вздохом произносит:{/n} "Думаю, тебе лучше это знать".

traits.locale_text: {n}For a while, Jae likewise remains silent, embroiled in some internal struggle, then finally says with a sigh,{/n} "I think it's better that you know."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}For a while, Jae likewise remains silent, embroiled in some internal struggle, then finally says with a sigh,{/n} "I think it's better that you know."

traits.locale_text: {n}For a while, Jae likewise remains silent, embroiled in some internal struggle, then finally says with a sigh,{/n} "I think it's better that you know."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}暫くの間、ジェイは沈黙を保った。その心中では、葛藤が渦巻いているようだった。そしてついに、ため息と共に口を開く。{/n}「あんたには知っておいてもらったほうがいいと思うんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, Jae likewise remains silent, embroiled in some internal struggle, then finally says with a sigh,{/n} "I think it's better that you know."

traits.locale_text: {n}暫くの間、ジェイは沈黙を保った。その心中では、葛藤が渦巻いているようだった。そしてついに、ため息と共に口を開く。{/n}「あんたには知っておいてもらったほうがいいと思うんだ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊一言不发，内心似乎在挣扎着。到了最后，她叹了口气，开了口。{/n}“我觉得还是告诉你比较好。”
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, Jae likewise remains silent, embroiled in some internal struggle, then finally says with a sigh,{/n} "I think it's better that you know."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊一言不发，内心似乎在挣扎着。到了最后，她叹了口气，开了口。{/n}“我觉得还是告诉你比较好。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Quelques instants durant, Jae reste également silencieuse, manifestement en proie à un conflit interne, puis elle laisse échapper un soupir et dit :{/n} « Je pense qu'il vaut mieux que vous soyez au courant. »
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, Jae likewise remains silent, embroiled in some internal struggle, then finally says with a sigh,{/n} "I think it's better that you know."

traits.locale_text: {n}Quelques instants durant, Jae reste également silencieuse, manifestement en proie à un conflit interne, puis elle laisse échapper un soupir et dit :{/n} « Je pense qu'il vaut mieux que vous soyez au courant. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Por un momento, Jae también guarda silencio, enzarzada en una lucha interna, hasta que suspira y habla:{/n} «Creo que es mejor que lo sepa».
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, Jae likewise remains silent, embroiled in some internal struggle, then finally says with a sigh,{/n} "I think it's better that you know."

traits.locale_text: {n}Por un momento, Jae también guarda silencio, enzarzada en una lucha interna, hasta que suspira y habla:{/n} «Creo que es mejor que lo sepa».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Auch Jae schweigt nun einen Augenblick. Sie scheint mit sich zu ringen, erklärt aber schließlich mit einem Seufzen:{/n} "Ich denke, es ist besser, wenn Ihr es wisst."
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, Jae likewise remains silent, embroiled in some internal struggle, then finally says with a sigh,{/n} "I think it's better that you know."

traits.locale_text: {n}Auch Jae schweigt nun einen Augenblick. Sie scheint mit sich zu ringen, erklärt aber schließlich mit einem Seufzen:{/n} "Ich denke, es ist besser, wenn Ihr es wisst."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}For a while, Jae likewise remains silent, embroiled in some internal struggle, then finally says with a sigh,{/n} "I think it's better that you know."

languages.text: {n}Aynı şekilde Jae da iç çatışmalarına dalıp bir süre sessiz kalıyor, ardından iç çekerek konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sanırım öğrenmen en doğrusu olacak."
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, Jae likewise remains silent, embroiled in some internal struggle, then finally says with a sigh,{/n} "I think it's better that you know."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aynı şekilde Jae da iç çatışmalarına dalıp bir süre sessiz kalıyor, ardından iç çekerek konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sanırım öğrenmen en doğrusu."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
